benchmark_details.name: Exec-CSN
benchmark_details.overview: Exec-CSN is a dataset created using the CODEBENCH GEN framework, containing 1,931 examples adapted from 367 GitHub repositories to evaluate code generation systems through execution-based benchmarks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate the evaluation of code generation systems across diverse scenarios and to provide scalable execution-based benchmarks.

data.source: GitHub repositories sampled from the CodeSearchNet dataset.
data.annotation: Automatically generated and adapted using the CODEBENCH GEN framework.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the number of examples that pass the generated test cases.
methodology.interpretation: Higher Pass@k scores indicate better performance by models in generating correct code.
methodology.baseline_results: GPT-4 achieved a Pass@1 score of 37.21%.
methodology.validation: The dataset was validated through human studies and iterative execution and debugging methods.
